20
21/* Written by Jim Meyering. */
22
23#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
24# include <config.h>
25#endif
26
27#include "__fpending.h"
28
29/* Return the number of pending (aka buffered, unflushed)
30 bytes on the stream, FP, that is open for writing. */
31size_t
32__fpending (FILE *fp)
33{
34 return PENDING_OUTPUT_N_BYTES;
35}
